Observing World Health Day across the state.
A drawing competition was held with students and a rally was done to spread awareness of clean and safe water and the safe handling of drinking water. 
Water For All - Health For All

World Health Day is observed across the state. In Hooghly, the day is observed by VWSC, Panchayat members, VHSNCs, Doctors, ASHA, and SHG members. 'Health for All-Water For All'
